alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 2:59PM CDT until May 06 at 2:27AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Baron Fork River at Eldon affecting Cherokee County. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River near Watts affecting Adair and Delaware Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Baron Fork River at Eldon. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, moderate flooding occurs. Grazing lands near the river become inundated. Low-lying areas near Camp Egan may experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 19.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
